ValidationRule.description: Only Selection System admins can create or upgrade other users to systems admin profile
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT ($Permission.Upgrade_users_to_Sys_admin), Profile.Name = 'System Administrator', OR(ISCHANGED(ProfileId), ISNEW()) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not eligible to enable System Administrator access for others. Please reach out to Salesforce Support.
